title: *PATREON PREVIEW* No Pigeons
description:
And just like that…everything was normal again in the world of Throwing Fits. This week, Jimmy and Larry are back in the saddle to discuss fat shaming, podcasting in the great outdoors, AMA fallout and their on mic role reversals, cowboy boots, basketweave linen, what to wear to an intimate industry dinner, whether or not Blokecore is actually real, Austin Butler vs. Madison Cawthorn vs. Mayer Hawthorne vs. Mr Hudson, who is really pulling the strings behind overturning Roe v. Wade, how long you should wait before having sex on your new couch, James going on IG Live with his ex-girlfriend, somehow missing each other at the movies, The Northman, Eastern Promises, final thoughts on the Met Gala, all content becoming sponcon and much more.

For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
